Name: Search and Navigate to Product Page from Homepage
Description: Navigate to the homepage, perform a search, click on a product link, check the price tab, and verify the homepage.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to *
Step 2: Click on searchButton
Step 3: Enter input value in searchInputField
Step 4: Click on americanEquityLink -> Navigate to page 'product page#*/products/*/*'
Step 5: Click on priceTab -> Navigate to page ''
Step 6: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
